name: 洪揮霖
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習經濟學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
schedule:
1. Review the rules of differentiation and integration.
2. Techniques of integration: substitutions
3. Techniques of integration: integration by parts
4. Techniques of integration: trigonometric substitutions
5. Techniques of integration: partition fractions
6. Improper integrals
7. Applications of integration: areas between curves
8. Applications of integration: volumes
9. Midterm
10. Applications of integration: arc length
11. Applications of integration: differentail equations
12. Parametric equations
13. Polar equations
14. Vector sapce
15. Partial derivatives
16. Multiple integrals
17. Series
18. Final exam
